title: ** 1 MONTH MOVE IN ** 1 BD 1,229 BASE RATE + TAXES AND FEES!!!
map_address: 4555 LAS VEGAS BLVD, N near CRAIG
posting_body: ['Nellis Suites at Main Gate is an all-suite extended stay offering quality accommodations and exceptional guest service.', 'Located directly across the street from the main gate of Nellis Air Force Base, one mile from the Las Vegas Motor Speedway and only minutes from the world-famous Las Vegas Strip, Nellis Suites at Main Gate is the obvious choice for quiet convenience just minutes away from the action', 'Nellis Suites at Main Gate -- An Extended Stay just Northeast of Las Vegas Nevada.', 'We offer;', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Fully equipped work out Gym', 'Furnished 1 bedroom Apartments', 'Furnished 2 bedroom Apartments', 'Full size Refrigerator', 'Full size Stove', 'Full size Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Pet Friendly Community', 'Seasonal Outdoor Pool', 'Free Cable TV', 'FREE UTILITIES', 'GREAT Parking', 'Professionally Managed', 'Maintenance Onsite', 'Near Shopping, Restaurants and Grocery Stores', 'Minutes from I-15 Highway']
